info.title: Komga API
info.description:
Komga offers 2 APIs: REST and OPDS.

Both APIs are secured using HTTP Basic Authentication.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.description: Mark all book for series as read

delete.description: Mark all book for series as unread

patch.description: Mark book as read and/or change page progress

schema.description: A map of book IDs which values are the metadata fields to update. Set a field to null to unset the metadata. You can omit fields you don't want to update.

parameters.name: convert
parameters.description: Convert the image to the provided format.

parameters.name: zero_based
parameters.description: If set to true, pages will start at index 0. If set to false, pages will start at index 1.

LibraryUpdateDto.description: Fields to update. You can omit fields you don't want to update.

SeriesMetadataUpdateDto.description: Metadata fields to update. Set a field to null to unset the metadata. You can omit fields you don't want to update.

ReadProgressUpdateDto.description: page can be omitted if completed is set to true. completed can be omitted, and will be set accordingly depending on the page passed and the total number of pages in the book.

BookMetadataUpdateDto.description: Metadata fields to update. Set a field to null to unset the metadata. You can omit fields you don't want to update.
